description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.
name: graphql

scripts.build: babel src --optional runtime --ignore __tests__ --out-dir dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && npm run build-dot-flow
scripts.build-dot-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/dist\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.check-cover: for file in {src/*.js,src/**/*.js}; do echo $file; flow coverage $file; done
scripts.lint: eslint src || (printf '\033[33mTry: \033[7m npm run lint -- --fix \033[0m\n' && exit 1)
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
